ngiemboon: Á laa tsɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ, e Ssé gɔɔn nò mbwó pamángʉanjʉʼ pégè, á na mekwò tà ńgyɔ́ɔn, mbɔɔ na mentí tà ńgyɔ́ɔn. Púʼu, ńcʉa na pantsẅìnkʉ̀ pé.
en: Long ago God spoke   to our ancestors by the prophets  # 1:1 2Kg 17:13; 21:10; 24:2; Jr 7:25; 26:5; 29:19; 35:15; 44:4; Ezk 38:17; Dn 9:6; Hs 12:10; Zch 1:6; 8:9; Mt 2:23; Lk 1:70; 24:44; Ac 2:30; 3:21,24 at different times and in different ways.  # 1:1 Nm 12:6,8; Jl 2:28

ngiemboon: Á kéen ńgwɔ́ na yégè kème njÿó yɔɔn gie á cʉ́ʼ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ ye lɔg ńzsote lɔɔn, á gɔɔn nò né pege, ńgwaa gɔɔn, ńcʉa pɔ́ na Míŋ we. Á gwɔ́ yé gẅie à la cʉa na yé, ńnyɛte njÿó ntsèm, ḿbiŋ ńgíŋ ńzába yé páʼ kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ ge láʼ gwɔ́ pɔ́ yé.
en: In these last days,   he has spoken to us by his Son. God has appointed him heir of all things  # 1:2 Jr 3:19; 10:16; Zch 8:12 and made the universe  # 1:2 Lit ages,# 1:2 Ps 2:8; Jn 1:3; Col 1:16; Rv 4:11 through him.

ngiemboon: Mé fó pɔ́ na múɔ wɔɔn tá ńgyá páʼ legúʼ Ssé, aa te làa yé púʼu. Á lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ gie e Ssé ee lêkɔ́ wɔ́ɔ, mbà Míŋ we gǐŋ ńgwɔ́ yé kwàʼ púʼu. Á yé gẅie à lɔg pɔ́ metʉ̀ mie ée na shwóŋè yé, ńtóonte kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie áa tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó ntsèm. À la gwɔ́ tà ńgÿo mmó gie Ssé ne fóo mǒ ńdege menò tepòŋ pʉ̀a mesoŋ tà á mag, á gʉa né tÿǒ lepwó, ńnéŋe na gwoŋó pwó Ssé yetʉ̀, á yé Ssé gẅie à pǔ sáʼa kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ.
en: The Son is the radiance   of God’s glory and the exact expression  # 1:3 Or representation, or copy, or reproduction of his nature,  # 1:3 2Co 4:4 sustaining all things by his powerful word.  # 1:3 Ps 33:6 After making purification for sins,  # 1:3 Other mss read for our sins by himself he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high.  # 1:3 Or he sat down on high at the right hand of the Majesty,# 1:3 Mt 22:44; Mk 16:19; Col 1:17

ngiemboon: Míŋ Ssé la pú ńcʉa mecÿɔ́ʼ Ssé, tà Ssé ná lezíŋ sie é pú éfáŋ ńcʉa sɔ́b.
en: So he became superior to the angels, just as the name he inherited is more excellent than theirs.

ngiemboon: E Ssé laa zɔɔn ńgɔɔn mbwó tsɔ̌ cÿɔ́ʼ we ngie:
en: For to which of the angels did he ever say,

ngiemboon: Tá á la ké ńgʉa fʉ̀ʼ gie e Ssé lɔ̌ɔn ńge gÿo míŋ we gẅie yé zɔ tyé twómvfò na kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ à tóo tsɛ̀ɛ njÿó, yé Ssé gɔɔn ngie:
en: Again, when he   brings his firstborn into the world,  # 1:6 Col 1:15,18; Rv 1:5 he says,

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa na mecÿɔ́ʼ pé, ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: And about the angels he says:

ngiemboon: Táʼ, ńké ńgʉa na míŋ we, á gɔɔn ngie:
Ɔ̀ kwoŋo nò gie á tyé ndʉŋndʉŋ, ḿbʉa nò tepòŋ.
Sɛ̌ shúm ge gÿo mag, táʼ, ńgʉa na gù, ɔ̀ gwɔ́ pɔ́ wó.
en: they will perish, but you remain.

ngiemboon: ɔ̀ ge gÿo káte wɔ́b páʼ mé káte nzsǒ fÿɔ́g la,
en: you will roll them up like a cloak,

ngiemboon: E Ssé laa zɔɔn ńgɔɔn né tsɔ̌ cÿɔ́ʼ we ngie:
en: Now to which of the angels has he ever said:

ngiemboon: Mecÿɔ́ʼ Ssé zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ mezẅìge mie é faʼa mbwó Ssé, e Ssé túmo wɔ́b, pɔ́ gʉa ńkẅéte pʉ̀a pie é ge gÿo gẅiin letsẅɛ́.
en: Are they not all ministering spirits sent out to serve those who are going to inherit salvation?
